inclusion.criterion: No general danger signs or severe malaria present
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: History of fever within 24 hours OR axillary temperature ≥ 37.5Cº
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No other cause of fever is detectable
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient has parasite counts between 2000-200,000/ul (50-5000/200 white blood cells)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Guardian/Patient has understood the procedures of the study and is willing to participate
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient able to come for stipulated follow up visits and has easy access to the Study Site
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: General Danger Signs and Complications: Not able to drink or breastfeed
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of allergy to test drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis, but no other exclusion criteria mentioned.
